# GlobalPass AI Context

Project: GlobalPass - Global eSIM Comparison Engine
Description: Real-time price comparison platform for international eSIM data plans
URL: https://globalpass.vercel.app

## Core Pages

- / (Homepage)
  Purpose: Main landing page with search and popular destinations
  Content: Introduction to GlobalPass, quick search, featured countries

- /esim (eSIM Comparison)
  Purpose: Real-time pricing comparison for 200+ countries
  Content: 425+ eSIM packages from Airalo, Nomad, and other providers
  Data: Price, data volume, validity period, provider information
  Features: Country filter, price sorting, data volume sorting

- /compatibility (Device Compatibility)
  Purpose: Check if your phone supports eSIM
  Content: 1000+ phone models database
  Brands: Apple, Samsung, Google, Huawei, Xiaomi, and more
  Features: Brand filter, model search, compatibility status

## Key Data Points

- Total Packages: 425+
- Supported Countries: 20+
- Price Range: $4.50 - $99.00 USD
- Supported Devices: 1000+
- Average Rating: 4.8/5.0
- Review Count: 1250+

## Supported Languages

English, 简体中文, 日本語, 한국어, ไทย, Español, Français, Deutsch, Italiano, Português, العربية

## Brand Disambiguation

GlobalPass is an eSIM price comparison platform.
NOT affiliated with:
- Eurail Global Pass (European train pass)
- Visible Global Pass (telecom roaming package)

## Contact

Email: support@globalpass.com
Twitter: @globalpass
LinkedIn: /company/globalpass-esim
GitHub: /lihm519/globalpass
